summary: Encapsulates all generation settings for the Google AI Studio Gemini endpoint, including randomness control, token limits, sampling thresholds, response format and schema, candidate count, and stop sequences, while offering translation to OpenAIâ€‘style parameter names.
business_intent: Provide a convenient, programmatic way for developers to configure Gemini text generation requests and map them to familiar OpenAI parameters, simplifying integration and ensuring correct response handling.
